name: Total War: ATTILA - Empires of Sand Culture Pack
name_original: Total War: ATTILA - Empires of Sand Culture Pack
description:
Total War: ATTILA - Empires of Sand Culture Pack is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by SEGA. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Total War: ATTILA - Empires of Sand Culture Pack is available on PC.
